name: getlistbysecuritiescode
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jp_funda.
Tool description: JP Funda API is an API that provides fundamental information based on the securities report data of Japanese companies in Json format.
API description: ### Return all of securities report data of the company specified with securities code.
Note: If  the company doesn't  have a consolidated subsidiary,  all of consolidated management indicators become null.ã€€But you can obtain data instead of consolidated management indicators from non consolidated management indicators

securities_code.description: The securities code of the company whose report data is to be fetched.
